subject: Re: 12-150 operator opinions?
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Have you seen this?

According to the post:
Dave's "SuperBox" is a Superadio III with a built-in function 
generator. The radio has been modified so the function generator 
controls the tuning voltage of the radio. 
http://www.itcbridge.com/forum/view_topic.php?id=363&forum_id=5


- Mike Coletta
http://www.ufomagazine.net

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "ourobouros2k2" <ourobouros2k2@...> 
wrote:
>
> Too bad, and if performance matches the other rs hacks, I will
> probably pass it over. I have been having a heckuva time on ebay
> trying to find a receiver with digital tuning and a decent size 
knob.
> Usually the volume knobs on tuners are massive, but only a smaller
> knob or two buttons for tuning are present. Guess I was a bit 
spoiled
> with the larger VFO type tuners of my long gone HF transceivers.
> Thanks for the heads up and saving me a buck.
> 
> Andy
